questions.latex: \question Define a function. Explain how it differs from a relation.
\question Determine whether the relation given by the set $\{(1,2),(2,3),(1,4)\}$ is a function. Justify your answer.
\question Given $f(x)=x^2-4x+5$, determine whether $f$ is one-to-one and explain your reasoning.
\question Find the domain of the function $f(x)=\sqrt{2x-5}$.
\question Find the domain of the function $f(x)=\dfrac{1}{x^2-9}$.
\question Find the domain and range of the function $f(x)=|x-3|+2$.
\question Sketch the graph of $f(x)=x^2$ and identify its vertex.
\question Sketch the graph of $f(x)=(x-2)^2+1$ and describe how it relates to the graph of $y=x^2$.
\question Describe the transformations applied to $y=x^2$ to obtain the graph of $f(x)=-2(x+1)^2+3$.
\question Given $f(x)=\sqrt{x}$, find the inverse function $f^{-1}(x)$ and state its domain.
